name: Naked in the snow
description:
Minigame made in 48h for Ludum Dare 45.

You find yourself and some others naked in the snow. You start with literally no clothes and have to get dressed to avoid freezing to death.

There are limited clothes available and it is getting colder by the minute. Grab and steal clothes until you are the last one alive.

Each time the temperature drops, everyone not wearing the clothing displayed will freeze to death.

Try not to be one of them.
